analyzed: dutiya naya saṅgahitena asaṅgahita pada niddesa

original: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
analyzed: phoṭṭhabba dhātuyā ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihā āyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhi āyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: manoviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena a saṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena a saṅgahitā pe

original: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhi āyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

analyzed: eka vokāra bhavena ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena a saṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena a saṅgahitā pe

analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi tīhi āyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: sanidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

original: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhi āyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: Anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dasahā āyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: Sanidassanehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

original: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?

satti indriyāḥ asaññā bhavo ekavokāra bhavo
paridevaḥ sa ni dassana sa paṭigha
anidassanam punar eva sa paṭigham upādāti
